title: U.S. Trade Gap Narrowed in July as Imports Fell
text:
The U.S. trade gap narrowed in July as manufacturing weakness held down imports of business equipment and supplies, the latest sign of slowing investment by American firms as they grapple with the effects of a trade war and weak global growth.
